Name: Cherry Daiquiri
Ingredients: 5 ml Syrup from Luxardo Maraschino Cherries
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: MUDDLE cherries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Cherry sweetness paired with Daiquiri sharpness.
History: Created in 2003 by yours truly, London, England.
